name: markdown-it-fa-bullet-list
description: A markdown-it plugin to use font awesome icons in a list.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-dist
scripts.build-dist: npm run build-dist-copyright && npm run build-dist-file && npm run build-dist-min
scripts.build-dist-min: cross-var uglifyjs dist/markdown-it-fa-bullet-list.js -b beautify=false,ascii-only=true -c -m --preamble "/*! $npm_package_name $npm_package_version $npm_package_homepage by $npm_package_author_name @license $npm_package_license */" > dist/markdown-it-fa-bullet-list.min.js

author: Daniel Brellis
